title: Development of a high-speed and ultrasensitive UV/Vis-CM for detecting total triterpenes in traditional Chinese medicine and its application
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Yuanyuan Guo, Zhe Han, Jingwei Zhang, Yue Lu, Chunfeng Li, Guiyan Liu
